column4: Anyone help me out here? I randomly can't type in ubuntu 11.10
you using a wireless keyboard?
No, laptop built in
as in other desktops? (xfce, kde etc.)
Grub screen and windows 7
oh, are you using unity?
I guess.. Its a fresh install of ubuntu 11.10
I had been using it fine for the past 2 days. Then my restart this morning caused the keyboard not to function. (It was functioning prior to restart)
i'd guess its a compiz issue, if you log out and log back in but pick no effects in the session box when you log in
So basically pick "Gnome - No Effects" from "Ubuntu" on the login screen?
Or pick Ubuntu 2d fallback
i'd try no effects, to rule out compiz (i think unity 2d still uses compiz(i might be wrong))
And Ubuntu 2D doesn't work either.
ah
i'm not sure what to suggest sorry
Well.. Keyboard works fine after I woke it from Suspend once. Even though multiple restarts didn't do anything. I don't even...
odd
ubuntu uses uuid by default so the dev name doesn't really matter to ubuntu
Then why does gparted fail to recognize the partition?
no idea
i'm just saying if you were using device names rather than uuid then ubuntu wouldn't boot when the device names change
